Label: Cluster Spacecraft 3, FluxGate Magnetometer (FGM) Unvalidated Prime Parameters - A. Balogh (ICSTM)

DatasetLink.Title: Note:  Cluster active archive Parameter FGM data (CP_FGM_SPIN) when possible should be used in preference to these FGM Prime Parameter or Summary data.
